info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Madison and west central Yancey Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Burnsville, or 7 miles north of Mars Hill, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mars Hill, Faust, Swiss and Wolf Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
